step: Heat the vegetable oil in a pot over medium heat.
Add the garlic and onion and saut√© for 3-4 minutes, until the onion is translucent.
Add the chopped kimchi, gochugaru, gochujang, and soy sauce to the pot and stir well.
Add the water and bring the mixture to a boil.
Reduce the heat to low and simmer for 10-15 minutes, until the kimchi is softened.
Add the cubed tofu and sliced shiitake mushrooms to the pot and simmer for another 5-10 minutes, until the tofu is heated through and the mushrooms are tender.
Serve hot, garnished with chopped green onions.
